name: FriendlyEvents
0:
”Alexa, Open Friendly Events”
”How many days to Codegarden”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: friendly events
des: Umbraco CMS is an open-source .Net CMS. It is the fastest-growing open source .NET CMS in the world with over 400,000 active installs. Umbraco has a community of nearly 2,00,000 active users around the world. Umbraco Festivals are a great way of building and maintaining relationships within the community and between the community and Umbraco HQ. This skill brings you information on how many days to Codegarden, for now. Codegarden is also the only Umbraco conference hosted by Umbraco HQ. The idea is to extend this skill to bring info about other festivals as well.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
